import random
import Bio
from Bio.Seq import Seq

def MutateBySubs(RBD,n):
  for _ in range(n):
    random_position=random.randint(0,len(RBD)-1)
    random_nucleotide=random.choice('ACGT')
    if(random_nucleotide!=RBD[random_position]):
      temp = list(RBD)
      temp[random_position] = random_nucleotide
      RBD = "".join(temp)
  return RBD
def MutateByInsertion(RBD,n):
  for _ in range(n):
    random_position=random.randint(0,len(RBD)-1)
    random_nucleotide=random.choice('ACGT')
    split_RBD = RBD.split()
    split_RBD.insert(random_position,random_nucleotide)
    RBD = "".join(split_RBD)
  return RBD

def MutateByDeletion(RBD,n):
  for _ in range(n):
    random_position=random.randint(0,len(RBD)-1)
    random_nucleotide=random.choice('ACGT')
    temp = list(RBD)
    temp.pop(random_position)
    RBD = "".join(temp)
  return RBD

RBD=""
Protein=Seq(RBD).translate()

  Mutated_RBD=Seq(MutateBySubs(RBD))
  print(Mutated_RBD)
  Mutated_Protein=Mutated_RBD.translate()

for _ in range(5):
